long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Looking for a seamless way to customize your browsing experience? Our Chrome extension offers an effortless background changer. With a simple toggle, you can access our customizable color wheel or choose from a selection of your favorite default colors. Transform your browser background with ease and make your online environment truly your own."
